```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library("p8105.datasets")
```

## 

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Load Instacart dataset
data("instacart")

# Creating a subset

instacart_subset <- instacart %>%
  filter(order_number <= 20) %>% 
  select(order_number, order_dow,order_hour_of_day, product_name, reordered) %>%   
  drop_na(order_number)
```
